GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.18.13
GSD.description:
serial: 8250: Fix PM usage_count for console handover

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit 5df66302f03f87ae8953785a882d78e911f00c55, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit bedb404e91bb2908d9921fc736a518a9d89525fc. For more details please see the references link.
